item.title: About
item.description: My name is Ethan Rosenthal, and I write a blog about data science called Data Piques. I am a Machine Learning Engineer at Dia&Co. I lead a team of scientists, engineers, and analysts focused on Styling and Customer Growth algorithms. I got my start in data science working at Birchbox. Prior to that, I earned a PhD in Physics from Columbia University where I studied unconvential superconductors.
